Course Curriculum

The programme comprises online courses from Technology and Management disciplines.

Technical Domain

Under this domain the student has the option to choose one of the following two specialization streams:

  1. Data Science
  2. Machine Learning
Data Sciences

The Data Science stream will equip you to venture into data-driven computing and will cover all the essential topics such as Mathematical Foundations, Data Visualization and Machine Learning.

  • Data Visualisation
    • Mr. Kathirmani
    • Co-founder, Quelit
  • Probability and Statistics for Data Sciences
    • Prof. Nandan Sudarsanam
    • IIT Madras
  • Parameter Estimation and Linear Regression
    • Prof. Arun Tangirala
    • IIT Madras
  • Introduction to Machine Learning
    • Prof. Balaraman Ravindran,
    • IIT Madras
Machine Learning

The Machine Learning stream will prepare you to start a career in AI. This will cover the fundamental concepts as well as exciting directions such as Deep Learning and Reinforcement Learning.

  • Introduction to Machine Learning
    • Prof. Balaraman Ravindran,
    • IIT Madras
  • Introduction to Deep Learning
  • Introduction to reinforcement Learning
    • Prof. Balaraman Ravindran,
    • IIT Madras
